title: Apple sultana cake
ingredients: ['4 or 5 cooking apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '150g (5 oz) sultanas', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g (8 oz) demerara sugar', '225g (8 oz) butter or margarine', '3 eggs', '225g (8 oz) self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon preferred spice, such as ground cinnamon or mixed spice', 'demerara sugar, for sprinkling']
